actions.text: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs Discharged by Suspension of Rules.

Received in the Senate, read twice.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 734.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Consumer Affairs and Coinage

official_title: A bill to award special Congressional gold medals to Fred Waring, the widow of Joe Louis, and Louis L'Amour.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to present, on behalf of the Congress, a gold medal to Fred Waring, Louis L'Amour, and the widow of Joe Louis. Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to strike and sell bronze duplicates of each medal. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to award special Congressional gold medals to Fred Waring, the widow of Joe Louis, and Louis L'Amour.
